{{cpp/experimental/ranges/title|UnsignedIntegral}}
{{cpp/experimental/ranges/concepts/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=experimental/ranges/concepts|since=ranges|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept bool UnsignedIntegral = Integral&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; !SignedIntegral&lt;T&gt;;
}}

概念 {{c|UnsignedIntegral&lt;T&gt;()}} 当且仅当 {{tt|T}} 为整数类型且 {{c|std::is_signed&lt;T&gt;::value}} 为 {{c|false}} 才得到满足。

===注解===
{{c|UnsignedIntegral&lt;T&gt;()}} 可能为非[[cpp/language/type#类型的分类|无符号整数类型]]的类型满足，例如 {{c|bool}}。
